snippet.title: Generation Zero Official Game Trailer
snippet.description: Generation Zero is a stealth-action shooter where you wage guerilla warfare against lethal mechanical enemies. Explore a vast open world map inspired by the Swedish Cold War era, take part of the Resistance alone or with up to three friends in seamless co-op.

localized.title: Generation Zero Official Game Trailer
localized.description: Generation Zero is a stealth-action shooter where you wage guerilla warfare against lethal mechanical enemies. Explore a vast open world map inspired by the Swedish Cold War era, take part of the Resistance alone or with up to three friends in seamless co-op.
